comments: I loved Lauren\'s class. She is super nice and always gets the class ready for the lesson that is planned for the day. I would recommend her to any freshman wanting to take her class. The way she teaches make it easy for me to learn and understand what she is teaching. I cant wait to be in her class next semester.

stu_tags: CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Instructions are not always clear. Also she is a big stickler for raising your hand when you want to speak. However if a discussion beginnings amongst the students she has a tendency to, when no one is raising their hand, to single one student out. She also interrupts students when they talk but scolds them when they do the same thing.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Amazing teacher! Shes more then fair with grades, if you ever need help with anything shes always there for you. Very nice and makes class interesting, if you find a class with her, TAKE IT! Easy A..
